hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #5# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #Skulls#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Ice Cavern#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #ReDead in the royal tomb# guard #Epona's Song#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #spider in the wasteland# holds #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #Skulls#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple GS Raised Island Courtyard

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #5# major items.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Farore's Wind#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Deku Tree#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Farore's Wind#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Hylian Shield# can be found in #the Haunted Wasteland#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #the Megaton Hammer# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Water Temple Boss Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #a Bow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Bottle# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Sun's Song#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Zora Tunic# can be found at #Zora's River#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Pocket Egg#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Lower Chest

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that tossing a bomb will cause a Blue Bubble to go after it.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #3# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room
